name: Renamed PsExec Service Execution
description: Detects suspicious launch of a renamed version of the PSEXESVC service with, which is not often used by legitimate administrators
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:psexesvc.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\PSEXESVC.exe)))`
